product.name: Compatible with Cordless Heat Gun Dewalt 20V Battery,LED Light,350W Fast Heating Hot Air Gun 122℉-1022℉ Variable Temperature Control,5 Nozzle for Craft Shrinking PVC Stripping Paint-No Battery
product.description:
(Fluctuation of ±122F (50°℃) is within normal range)
Getting Rid of the Wires, Use Anywhere You Need to
Q1: Can I control the temperature precisely for different projects?
Yes! The heat gun offers a wide adjustable temperature range from 122°F to 1022°F (50°C to 550°C). With its variable temperature dial and 5 airflow settings, you can fine-tune the heat output to match any task.
Q2: What kind of projects is a cordless heat gun suitable for?
This cordless heat gun is great for automotive vinyl wrap, heat shrink tubing, loosening adhesive, removing stickers, craft work, and small home repairs — especially in tight spaces or outdoor environments where plugging in is not possible.
Q3: Can I use this for electronics or delicate tasks?
Yes, it's great for electronics repair, shrink-wrapping wires, or loosening adhesives. For larger jobs, we recommend using a fully charged high-capacity battery or keeping a backup battery handy to ensure smooth workflow.
Q4: What’s included in the box?
The package includes 1x heat gun, 1 x Putty Knife, 1 x handheld scraper, 5x professional nozzle attachments, and a detailed user manual. Everything you need to get started right out of the box!
product.bullet_points:
• 【Efficient Heating】– The hot air gun adopts a high-quality motor, equipped with a 350W heater, which has fast heating and excellent durability. the Temperature ranges are from 122℉ (50℃) to 1022°F(550℃), meeting the heating needs in different working scenarios. In addition, its airflow regulation has 5 stages, Strong mode maximum airflow: 550 L / min, weak mode maximum airflow: 300 L / min. for tasks like paint stripping, shrink-wrapping, or thawing pipes. Make your work more efficient.[Product set does not include battery]
• 【Safety & Portability】– Safety is the primary consideration in the design of a heat gun. the heat gun rechargeable is equipped with a safety lock button to prevent misuse. There is a "safety lock" button that allows you to work hands-free and free your hands. Cordless portable heat gun, which makes it easy to use even outdoors where there is no power source, getting rid of the cord and increasing the convenience and flexibility of use. inside can even provide illumination for use in otherwise dark environments ents.
• 【LCD Display Design】– This portable small heat gun is equipped with a temperature adjustment function and an LCD display, the LCD display can finely adjust the air volume and temperature, and the temperature and air volume can be adjusted according to different scenes to meet various work scenes. Meanwhile, its stable performance ensures the continuity and consistency of heating effects, improving work efficiency.
• 【Versatile Accessory 】– Our hot air guns contain a total of 7 accessories. 5 Different heat gun nozzles. Tackle diverse tasks with a focused airflow nozzle and a wide-angle diffuser for even heat distribution. They are ideal for a variety of DIY projects and specialized tasks. ideal use for shrink wrapping, epoxy resin, shrink tubing, crafts, cell phone repairs, vinyl wrap, paint removal, electronics repair, and other heating or thawing purpose.
• 【Quality assurance 】– This product comes with 1 heat gun, 5 x nozzle, 1 x Putty Knife, 1 x handheld scraper, 1 x User Manual. (Batteries and chargers must be purchased separately.) Compatible with Cordless Heat Gun Dewalt 20V Battery: DCB200 DCB201 DCB181 DCB182 DCB203 DCB204 DCB205 DCB206 DCB208 DCB21.etc. *Please note: We conduct strict quality inspection before shipping, but if the product you receive is defective or you have any questions or suggestions during use, please contact us and we will give you a satisfactory reply within 24 hours. Our team of professionals is ready to deliver ongoing technical help that extends for the life of your device.
• Friendly Tips: 1. This heat gun does not contain any batteries 2. Please remove the batteries when not in use 3. Be careful when using the heat shrink gun to avoid burns 4. Do not use the tool with wet hands. Please note: This cordless heat gun is compatible with DEWALT 20v battery series, but is not an original DE-WALT item.
